file_content.text: I hate Imperials. Crazier than a Hutt on Glitterstim.
What kind of morons blow up their own ship so it don't get looted?
We stumbled onto some kind of internal power play. The Voidwolf just took down three Moffs.
There's more to it.
Good. Let them blow each other up. Long as we got the money.
The whole Empire's filled with folks who'd poison their own soup just to kill the guy across the table.
Imperial morons.
Here's to the Republic chasing them back into dark space.
How much did we get away with?
Let's talk haul.
Let's split and then let's split, you know? I don't want to chance anyone following.
How much did we get?
Forget pooling it. I'll take what I got, you take what you got. Call it even.
I'm keeping what's mine.
That's the way you want it, sounds fair to me. Been a pleasure, Captain.
C'mon, Combo. Let's go lie low and count this up.
Here's everything I got. What do you have?
Let's split it evenly.
I'll have Combo tally. He's good with numbers and honest like a Jedi.
Been nice working with you, Captain. You're good people.
C'mon, Combo. Let's go see what kind of hidey-hole this haul can buy us.
Th--thanks, Captain!
Thanks for the help, boys. I don't need you anymore.
It's all mine. [Attack.]
You back-stabbing traitor! Combo, look clear!
What are you waiting for? Let's launch this ship.
This is the ship we'll use to rendezvous. It's Imperial salvage, so it's good camo.
Combo's cracked the signal we need to dock with the King's Ransom.
If the rest of this goes that smoothly, I'm taking you on all my jobs.
Good work, partner.
Don't jinx us.
What happens once we dock?
What's the plan?
Let's roll.
Bay's filled with empty cargo containers. Me and Combo will hide in one while you pilot us in.
I--in one?
After you secure the hangar bay, pop us and we'll loot the vaults from inside.
W--will you hold my hand, Vaz? You know I don't like the dark....
Didn't I show you I won't let anything hurt you, bud? Just climb in, nice and easy....
Spring us when we're clear.
Told you I wouldn't let them hold you.
I told 'em you'd come for me, Vaz. They didn't think you could do it.
Thanks lots for bringing Vaz here. I was real scared without him.
You shouldn't have let the Hutt walk, Captain. No points for live enemies.
If I can do my work without bloodshed, that's how I prefer it.
I don't kill for no reason.
Everyone's got quirks.
I'll doctor the scene a bit. Make it unmistakable that Strilth was the one who turned on the Hutt.
Cutting Rogun off from the Hutts should cut his influence considerably.
Thanks for the suggestion.
Can't call yourself a crime lord if there's no Hutts to buy what you're selling.
Your friend doesn't seem too bright.
That's your vault cracker?
He's a, whatchacallit, savant. Believe me, with code, he's the best.
I was always good with numbers. It was Vaz taught me how I could use it.
I protect him. We work together.
Let's talk heist.
Now we hit that Imperial treasure ship. Darmas made arrangements for us to use one of the Republic's secret shuttle pads to get up there.
I'll transmit the specs and meet you. Then we'll bilk those Imperials out of more credits than you've ever seen.
Now!
That's where they got Combo.
The Hutts got their security hooked directly into the main juice, but I know where to go to shut it down.
When you get my signal, go in. I'll join you when I'm clear.
Sounds like you're keeping the easy part for yourself.
Why am I the one going in?
Nothing easy here. But we need Combo to take the ship.
Let's go.
The Hutts got guards who'll defend this place with their life, but the one to watch out for is Strilth.
If I get in and find Rogun's best assassins waiting for me, I will hunt you down.
This better not be a trick.
They're waiting, but not for you.
Strilth's a Houk, one of Rogun's best heavies. He sees either of us, we're dead.
I'll kill the power now. See you inside, Captain.
Your hand is even faster than your mind, Captain. The Hutt Cartel has always appreciated boldness.
I will go now and tell them of your recent victory. I think they'll be confident I made the correct deal.
It's good to have a Hutt in your pocket. Figuratively speaking.
I like this deal, too.
That'd be a big pocket....
Let's settle our business.
